reviewText: So much info I am loving it
The information in book sort of bounces around a bit. Not a straight forward book for beginners. Okay for intermediate.
trhis will help with doing some bread and butter work for some local fairs next year. Now buying glass to start

I bought this video for my son who does not have access to a  stained glass class near him.  This is  most clear and detailed.  He likes being able to stop and start at will.  He has learned so much more than the books he bought.
